bibl.title: A New Wooden Board from the Temple at Kellis.
bibl.note: Wooden board found during the season of excavations of January/February 1995. - Front side. Receipt for the price of fowl. A.D. 267/8 - 268/9. - Back side. Receipt for rent. A.D. 270/1 or 272/3? - 271/2 or 273/4?
WORP Klaas A., A New Wooden Board from the Temple at Kellis.
Akten des 21. Internationalen Papyrologenkongresses = ArchPF. Beiheft 3. II (Stuttgart - Leipzig, 1997) pp. 1014-1020 et pl. XXVI coul.
